ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Sends a region description to ds9, where it is drawn in the current frame.

DESC.PARA: A region description is sent to the imager (ds9 by default), where it is drawn in the current frame. There is no return value.

LIST.ITEM: reg - region description in CIAO region syntax

DESC.PARA: If "reg" is a string defining a region in CIAO region syntax, then the region is drawn in the current frame of ds9. In this example, a circular region with center coordinates (4300, 3710) and radius=15 is drawn.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
